records.name: Meeru Maldives Resort Island

descriptions.direction: Located in Meerufenfushi, Meeru Maldives Resort Island is on the beach. Notable landmarks in the area include Republic Square and Maldives Islamic Centre, and travelers wishing to experience a bit of culture can try National Museum. Take an opportunity to explore the area for water adventures such as windsurfing.
descriptions.general: A tropical paradise of coconut palm trees, long stretches of white sandy beach, surrounded by sparkling clear, warm water in a turquoise lagoon, and colorful coral reefs teeming with abundant marine life. A 55-minute scenic speedboat transfer will bring you to this untouched, natural paradise from Velana International Airport. Meeru is a multiple-award-winning Resort in the Maldives and is rated as the top All-Inclusive Resort with family-friendly facilities, personalized service, and the comforts of a second home. With 284 guest rooms in 5-room categories, Meeru offers comfortable accommodation with tropical decor and modern amenities, whether close to the beach or over the water. The 2 main Buffet Restaurants provide “all-you-can-eat” style dining, with delicious and freshly prepared cuisine for you to enjoy...Including Theme Nights! Each of the 4 “optional” A la Carte dining options offers unique dining experiences, from Asian cuisine to meals served on pre-heated “Hot Rocks”. The various entertainment, sports, and activities are designed to keep you entertained throughout your holidays. Honeymoon / Wedding Anniversary (Silver & Gold): Complimentary fruit plate, a bottle of sparkling wine, and flowers in the room. Benefits Beach Pool Villa: 01 Nov 2025 – 31 Oct 2026 One Complimentary Floating Breakfast during the guest's stay Free Sheesha in all available outlets Dedicated Island Host service Dine around at buffet Restaurants, Maalan & Farivalhu, child restriction applies Complimentary delights from Chef on arrival Complimentary delights from Chef during Turndown service 20% discount for one-hourspa treatment as “Early Bird Promotion” during first 2 daily. Complimentary daily boat trip to Meeru house reef (with age restriction, equipment not included). Complimentary use of Golf Putting Green Complimentary use of Bicycle for 2 guests.

records.short_description: Chic resort with 284 rooms, outdoor pool and poolside bar
